name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Zack ELLERBE, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Zack ELLERBE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
The judgment of sentence is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Buford W. Tatem, II, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Denis Cohen, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1157
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Zack ELLERBE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 30, 1981.
Decided July 2, 1981.
Buford W. Tatem, II, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Denis Cohen, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
